content.rendered:
31 December 2015 – Energy consulting group Aqualis ASA has appointed Kim Boman as new CFO.

Mr Boman has almost 20 years’ experience, primarily from corporate finance and investor relations roles. He was previously head of investor relations for REC Solar ASA. Prior to this he worked in corporate finance at DNB Markets and Swedbank Markets. He also has experience as an auditor at PricewaterhouseCoopers and as a strategy consultant at Arkwright.

Mr Boman holds a Masters degree in Business and Economics from the Norwegian School of Management and a MSc in Finance from London Business School.

Mr Boman joins Aqualis ASA on 4 January 2016.

ENDS

 

For further information, please contact:

David Wells, CEO, Aqualis ASA, tel: +44 7717 636 783, email: david.wells@aqualisbraemar.com

 

About Aqualis ASA

Aqualis ASA (OSE: Aqua) is a public company that, through its subsidiaries, offers energy consultancy services to the oil and gas, wind and solar sectors globally. The group employs approximately 330 experienced consultants across 22 offices in 15 countries worldwide. Aqualis ASA operates under three different brands: AqualisBraemar, Offshore Wind Consultants and Adler Solar. AqualisBraemar is a specialized offshore marine and engineering consultancy firm, focusing on the shallow and deep-water offshore segments of the oil and gas industry. Offshore Wind Consultants is a globally focused consultancy providing independent services to the offshore renewables industry. Adler Solar is a technical and engineering service provider for the global solar industry. Aqualis owns 49.9 percent of Adler Solar.

This information is subject to the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.
